transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Rudra ji namaskar.
Customer: Ha ji namaskar. Bolo bhai bataiye.
Executive: Badhiya hai sir kaise hai sir.
Customer: Badhiya hai sir aap bataiye.
Executive: Mai bhi badhiya badhiya. Ye do teen cheeze hai. Pehla number to aapka wala kaam kara deta hu do minute lagenge. Actually hota kya hai na sir dekhiye kuch private cheeze hoti hai na IndiaMART hum log ko access nahi deta hai ki Rudra sir hum log usse wo delete kar paye ya edit kar paye. Thik hai sir. Aur jo ye product ha kuch aisi cheeze hoti hai jo hamare paas access hota hai ki hum kuch delete kar payenge ya update kar payenge. Ye wala jo cheez hai na sir ye aapki side se hi access hota hai isko delete karne ka. Thik hai.
Customer: Hmm. Ek minute dijiyega mai aapko bata deta hu. Seller open kar lo aapka CRM portal open kar lo. Line pe rahiyega.
Customer: Abhi mai system pe nahi hu pehle problem ye hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi samajh to jayenge na sir.
Customer: Hai?
Executive: Mai agar bata dunga to samajh to jayenge hi ki kaise karna hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Thik hai na. Ab dekhiye jaise aap system pe rehte hai thik hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: System pe rehte hai to sara dekhte hai na ki waha pe har sab cheez open hua rehta hai sir. Dashboard profile lead manager buylead. Correct hai na.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Left side me to wahi pe ek dekhiyega na sir product ke neeche na ek chota sa tab aata hai photo and documents ka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Photo and documents laptop se hi hoga na wo. Mobile se nahi hoga na.
Executive: Mobile se kar sakte hai ek baar open kariye to mai dekh lu open kariye.
Customer: Is number pe call kiya na net nahi chalega mera.
Executive: Achha do teen number use karte hai kya.
Customer: Do number hai na ek mobile pe ye dikkat hai.
Executive: To is is wale me net nahi hai.
Customer: Dusre wale me shayad nahi hai. Aaj kal to bina net ka koi recharge hi nahi aata sir.
Customer: Hai? Setting me setting me jaake iska net on kar dijiye.
Executive: Mai ye keh raha hu ki aaj kal har recharge isme sir net to rehta hi rehta hai setting me jaake iska jis sim se baat ho rahi hai na is sim ka net on kar denge to net chalne lagega.
Customer: Pehle mere ko bata dijiye na kya jaana hai.
Executive: Chaliye mai bata deta hu jaise IndiaMART mobile aap open karenge thik hai. Hmm.
Executive: To left side me top pe rehna three line rehti hai rehti hai na. Ha. Setting me jaana hai.
Executive: Setting me nahi jaana hai setting se pehle hi aapko mil jayega ek product mil jayega thik hai product naam iska likha hua mil jayega thik hai. Us product pe click karenge na to us pe jitne aapne abhi tak ke photo bheje hai sir 1300 1389 photo bheje hai sir.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: 1389 photo aapne share kiya hai production team ko unhi 13 1389 photo me wo sari photo lagi hui hai sir thik hai. Usme se isko hatana hai.
Customer: Ha usme se jaake isko hatana hai thik hai tab jaake aap ktega ye hamare side se access nahi hota hai sir thik hai.
Executive: Dusra cheez Rudra bhai kisi se aapne galat rating and review liya hai liya hai kya ya lene ki koshish kar rahe the account pe apne.
Customer: Galat rating. Aisi aapko. Ha rating and review ek complaint aayi thi aapki ki Rudra ji jo hai galat tarike se rating and reviews le rahe hai sir.
Customer: Kyu le rahe hai kaha se kisne complaint ki mere saath baat karwao.
Executive: Backend team se aaya hai sir isme na aap rating and review kaise lete hai customer se thoda apna process bataiye to.
Customer: Mere ko pata nahi yaar wo team ne kisi se baat ki hogi to liya hoga pata nahi maine to kisi se liya nahi rating abhi tak.
Executive: Thik hai aap aap aap baat team team jab kaam karti hai to team se hi team hi le rahi hogi ek customer aisa jaise Riddhi Bhavnagar Gujarat ka ek customer thik hai. Ha.
Executive: Hai na isne aapke bare me respond diya hai ki Rudra sanitary wire Rajkot Gujarat ke sabse bharosemand CP bath fitting ke manufacturer hai thik hai. Ha.
Executive: Unke product bahut hi tikau hai corrosion resistant hai aur bahut hi achhe modern design ke saath aate hai thik hai. Ha ha.
Executive: Finish finish bahut smooth hai aur shiny hoti hai customer service bhi responsive hai aur delivery bhi correct hai.
Customer: Ha to kya hua usme Riddhi ne kuch bola Riddhi ne kuch kiya.
Executive: Ye Riddhi ne diya hai feedback to ye Riddhi kaun hai sir mai jaan sakta hu.
Customer: Wo Riddhi to staff ki member hi hai.
Executive: Aapki aapki company me kaam karne wali staff hai. Ha. Achha dekhiye yahi galat hua na sir isi ko rokna hai dekhiye aapko rating and review us customer se leni hoti hai jisse aapki deal ho jaye sir complete ho jaye. Ha to staff member hai. To usne rating de diya aisa hai.
Executive: Ha rating and feedback feedback unka hi padh ke bata raha hu mai screenshot aapko dal deta hu whatsapp pe aap dikhaiyega ki aage se aise na kare nahi to sir phir jo bhi action hoga mandatory IndiaMART ki taraf se wo mandatory action aapke khilaaf aapki company ke upar liya ja sakta hai sir. Usne rating de diya hoga pata nahi mere ko bhi nahi pata.
Customer: Ab jo bhi sir pata nahi. Aap aap aapne bataya ki meri staff hai lekin mere paas to notification aa gayi thi legal team se ki ispe kuch unauthorized kaam ho raha hai to aap isse connect kariye pehli baar samjhaiye teen warning hoti hai sir ye pehli hai do aur bhi Rudra ji to isme jo bhi ab backend team action legi usme hum mai kuch bhi aapko help nahi usne ye ek usne kiya hoga usme pehle hai na uske number se usne login kiya tha IndiaMART khud ke number se uske baad usi mobile se usne company ka number login kiya uski wajah se samajh gaya. Par itna pata chal gaya hoga aisa hoga. Itna itna likhna bhi to nahi chahiye sir likha bhi to Nidhi ne hi hoga sir. Ha usne hi likha hoga. Ha to wahi mai keh raha hu ye likhne ka bas unhi unhi logo ke paas access hona chahiye ya dena chahiye jin jinhone maal liya hai jo aapke buyer hai genuine buyer hai unse Mere ko abhi nahi pata usne rating kiya hai wo. Aap ek baar baat kijiyega main aapko Aaj kal leta hu chalo mai abhi mai wo koi baat nahi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi maine aapko whatsapp pe screenshot send kiya hai. Abhi me aapko connect karta hu wapas.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap mujhe kal connect kijiyega baki aapko maine screenshot bheja wo dekh lijiye phir aap kal free hoke mujhe connect kijiyega thik hai. Koi koi baat nahi chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to delete photos from product listing.

- Executive received complaint about fake ratings/reviews.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to delete photos.

- Executive explained policy against fake ratings/reviews.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check WhatsApp screenshot.

- Customer will connect with executive tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- photos, product, ratings, reviews, policy
